signature.name: love.graphics.newImage

overload.arg: The filepath to the image file.
The filepath to the image file.
The type of image mode (padded, optimized, or both).

signature.returns: An Image object containing the display data.

overload.arg: The source Image for the Animation.
overload.returns: An Animation object with no frames.

overload.arg: The source Image for the Animation.
The width of each frame.
The height of each frame.
The delay (seconds) between each frame.
The number of frames to include. (0 = all)

signature.name: love.graphics.newColor

overload.arg: The amount of red.
The amount of green.
The amount of blue.
The amount of alpha.
The amount of red.
The amount of green.
The amount of blue.

signature.returns: A Color object containing the color data.

signature.name: love.graphics.newFont

overload.arg: The filepath to the font file.
The filepath to the font file.
The size of the font.

signature.returns: A Font object containing the font data.

signature.name: love.graphics.newImageFont

overload.arg: The filepath to the font file.
A list of the characters as they are in the image.
The filepath to the font file.
A list of the characters as they are in the image.
The spacing factor.

signature.returns: A Font object containing the font data.
